author: hwright
msg: Fix the tigris upload script so that it completes in under an hour.
This is a complete hack, but so is the entire script.
* tools/dist/post-to-tigris.py
Set the default socket timeout to 5 seconds.
(add_single_item): New.
(add_items): Remove the referer header, and call the new helper function.

author: hwright
msg: Merge r32448 from trunk:
Copy properties of 'svn add'ed but uncommitted files.
Justification:
Makes sure that auto and normal props that are applied to a file actually
get committed when a new file is renamed before this first commit.
(Reported as AnkhSVN bug)
Note:
The second hunk in copy_tests.py (adding mergeinfo expectation) has
been reverted on trunk, I suppose it should be reverted after merging.
Yes, it can be, that is a holdover from when WC to WC copies created
empty mergeinfo on the target.  Accepting mine-conflict on copy_tests.py
will give the correct result -- pburba.
Votes:
+1: rhuijben, danielsh, pburba

author: hwright
msg: More fixes the the release posting script.  Now, this actually works...for
one of the 12 artifacts to be posted.
* tools/dist/post-to-tigris.py
(encode_multipart_form):  Add a trailing boundary.
(add_items): Remove unneeded form entries, and update the url entry name.
